data.comment: Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Patrick Joosten.
In the minute 29, That's a fine assist from Wessel Dammers.
Matus Bero (Vitesse) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Lois Openda levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 45, Oussama Tannane with an assist there.
The second half has started at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
In the minute 46, Thomas Buitink is on a sub for Tomas Hajek for Vitesse.
Bart van Hintum (Groningen) has received a first yellow card.
Wessel Dammers is booked for the home team.
In the minute 75, Danny Buijs is making the team's first substitution at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium with Remco Balk replacing Gabriel Gudmundsson.
Mo El Hankouri is replacing Patrick Joosten for the home team.
Vitesse make their second substitution with Daan Huisman replacing Armando Broja.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Lois Openda with Hillary Gong. This is the third substitution made today by Thomas Letsch.
